name: Apple Juice
description: Juice made from apples. Apple juice and apple cider offer different levels of sweetness and tartness. Freshly pressed apple juice tends to be sweeter and more aromatic, while apple cider, especially hard cider, adds a tangy, fermented flavor that can complement both light and dark spirits.

ingredient_parts.name: Apple
ingredient_parts.description: Apple is a versatile fruit commonly used in cocktails for its crisp, sweet, and sometimes tart flavor. It can be incorporated in various forms, including fresh slices, apple juice, apple cider, or apple liqueur, each bringing a unique character to a drink. Fresh apple slices or wedges are often used as a garnish, adding a refreshing element and a touch of natural sweetness to cocktails.
